attributes.action: Protect the right of burial for any Muslims who pass away due to Covid-19 virus
attributes.additional_details:
The British Muslim community are very concerned about any plans to cremate the bodies of Muslim victims who pass away   due to Covid-19 infection. Such actions are against the beliefs of all Muslims & we require assurances that cremation of Muslim bodies will not occur under any circumstances.
We understand Parliament is due to consider an alternative way but as British Muslims, any other way other than burial is not allowed & totally unacceptable.
attributes.background: With the increasing death toll in the UK due to the coronavirus we  need reassurance  that the right of burial for Muslims and people of other faiths  is protected.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305167.

Find out more and watch the Committee put questions suggested by petitioners to Government Ministers and the Deputy Chief Medical Officer: https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/326/petitions-committee/news/145767/committee-question-deputy-chief-medical-officer-and-ministers-on-coronavirus-response/
